data.text: @AgaGambus There ought to be a law preventing that🥴
@AgaGambus Impressed! And I miss printed theses, putting electronic notes on a PDF just isn't the same 😅

@MZaehler Researchfish is an activity reporting website through which UK academics need to yearly report their outputs, activities and impacts that result from government supported funding (and some charities too). One of our yearly favourite jobs 😀
@AgaGambus Just curious, what is a researchfish? Something akin to Danio rerio? And, by the way, 444-page theses ought to be banned in the first place.
@AgaGambus Amazing. And look at all those post-its!
@AgaGambus Oh no! Hope everyone recovers quickly
@JessicaMABlair Iâ€™m so far the last (wo)man standing without covid in our house 😀
@AgaGambus That is impressive! We are back in covid-land too but I am thinking that I seriously need to up my post-it note game. Hope you treat yourself to something delicious.
@AgaGambus Oh no - hope you are all ok! And yes you definitely deserve a glass of something nice!
